title: Remote Community-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Language education curriculum that combines e-learning platforms with offline activities in a limited technological environment centered around smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners improve communication skills by completing collaborative language tasks with peer learners at least twice weekly via an e-learning platform.
Learners apply real-time communication skills by exchanging opinions in the target language at least three times weekly in online discussion forums.
Learners produce five or more language expression samples weekly using mobile-based voice recording tools and achieve over 80% pronunciation accuracy through peer evaluations.

resources: Printed Learning Material Kit for Offline Collaboration
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
